tag_professor: Gives good feedback (5)  Participation matters (2)  Hilarious (2)  Caring (1)  Inspirational (1)  Respected (1)
comments: Professor Wright was one of my favorites! His class was super easy, only 5 essays and a couple of quizzes throughout the year which wasn\'t too bad! Attendance isn\'t mandatory, he does give you a few chances. Overall, great man! Definitely recommend his class.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (5)  Participation matters (2)  Hilarious (2)  Caring (1)  Inspirational (1)  Respected (1)
comments: His class was one of my favorite classes, he is very understanding and stays after class to chat or to talk about grades or assignments. When he takes attendance, he asks questions about a topic and that pretty much the participation. Professor Wright does assign readings for quizzes but they\'re so easy if you read. Definitely recommend!

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (5)  Participation matters (2)  Hilarious (2)  Caring (1)  Inspirational (1)  Respected (1)
stu_tags: INSPIRATIONAL  GIVES GOOD FEEDBACK  PARTICIPATION MATTERS
comments: Professor Wright is a marvelous teacher. He has a great way to approaching the class and has a interesting sense of humor. He is a professor that is easy to talk and easy to get along with. While being serious and focusing on reading and writing essays, he makes the learning process fun. You won\'t regret having him as a professor! (:

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (5)  Participation matters (2)  Hilarious (2)  Caring (1)  Inspirational (1)  Respected (1)
comments: Great teacher, always makes you do class participation by asking you funny questions. Super clear about his work. I was never a fan of English, I hated it, but his English class was so easy! Would definitely recommend to take him, his classes always fill up!

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (5)  Participation matters (2)  Hilarious (2)  Caring (1)  Inspirational (1)  Respected (1)
stu_tags: HILARIOUS  GIVES GOOD FEEDBACK  PARTICIPATION MATTERS
comments: Mr. Wright made writing papers fun, if that\'s even possible. He has a great sense of humor. He understands when things come up, but don\'t take advantage. Only wrote 3 papers and 1 revision. He never cancels class but his classes are fun, makes you want to go. Use the water and culture reader and sometimes the penguin handbook.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (5)  Participation matters (2)  Hilarious (2)  Caring (1)  Inspirational (1)  Respected (1)
comments: LOVE this teacher. By far one of the best teachers i\'ve had the honor studying with at the pathetically average campus.

comments: He is a great teacher. His classes are actually fun.

comments: Very nice professor. As long as you attend class and put a little effort into your papers you\'ll be fine. He understands if something comes up, but don\'t lie. There\'s an end of the semester presentation. Very straight forward.

comments: Professor Wright is pretty cool, he focuses a lot on censorship which I didn\'t like much but the way he explains assignments is verrrry clear and he\'s a very fun teacher. His tests are SUPER easy it\'s a group effort, very laid back class, and dare I say FUN!
